an9.62:1.1: “Nava, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an9.62:1.3: Rāgaṁ, dosaṁ, mohaṁ, kodhaṁ, upanāhaṁ, makkhaṁ, paḷāsaṁ, issaṁ, macchariyaṁ—
an9.62:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, nava dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an9.62:2.1: Nava, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an9.62:2.3: Rāgaṁ, dosaṁ, mohaṁ, kodhaṁ, upanāhaṁ, makkhaṁ, paḷāsaṁ, issaṁ, macchariyaṁ—
an9.62:2.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, nava dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātun”ti.
